From: 
To: 
Cc: "Mark S. Cohen" 'Jeff Pagliuca' 
Laura Menninger 
, "BOBBI C STERNHEIM" 
Subject: RE: Letter 
Date: Thu, 29 Oct 2020 02:20:54 +0000 
Attachments: 2020-10-28_Letter to_GM_counsel_re_Rule_16_and_Bradyffinal).pdf 
Inline-Images: image00 I jpg; image002.jpg 
Counsel, 
Please see attached. 
Best, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2020 11:04 AM 
To: Christian Everdell 
I 4:IM>; 
(USANYS) 
• 
; 'Jeff Pagliuca' ; Laura Menninger 
BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Subject: RE: Letter 
Chris, 
We are continuing to review the requests in your letter, and we intend to provide you with a written response to those 
requests as soon as we are able. We note, though, that your letter makes dozens of broad requests — including at least 
one request that Judge Nathan has already denied. As a result, although we fully intend to respond in sufficient time to 
permit you to make any motion you deem appropriate in December consistent with the Court's schedule, we do not 
anticipate being able to do so on or before October 21, 2020. 
Best, 
Assistant m ates Attorney 
ew York 
New York, NY 10007 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, October 14, 2020 9:26 AM 
To: 'Christian Everdell 
(USANYS) 
EFTA00030567

Subject: Letter

Subject: RE: Letter 
Received, thank you. 
'Jeff Pagliuca' 
Laura Menninger 
BOBBI C 
STERNHEIM

Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007

Sent: Tuesday, October 13, 2020 11:38 PM

review. dissemination or copying of this e-mail or the information contained herein is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in amt. please immediately notify 
the sender by telephone and 
permanently 
delete this e-mail. Thank you.
